00014 WireAbstraction::WirePort::WirePort(QDomNode& wireNode):
00015 presence_(General::OPTIONAL), 
00016 width_(-1),
00017 direction_(General::DIRECTION_INVALID) {
00018         for (int i = 0; i < wireNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00019                 QDomNode tempNode = wireNode.childNodes().at(i);
00020 
00021                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:presence")) {
00022                         presence_ = General::str2Presence(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).
00023                                         nodeValue(), General::OPTIONAL);
00024                 }
00025 
00026                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:width")) {
00027                         bool ok = false;
00028                         width_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt(&ok);
00029 
00030                         // if the conversion failed the default value is restored
00031                         if (!ok) {
00032                                 width_ = -1;
00033                         }
00034                 }
00035 
00036                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:direction")) {
00037                         direction_ = General::str2Direction(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).
00038                                         nodeValue(), General::DIRECTION_PHANTOM);
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 // TODO add parsing of spirit:modeConstraints
00042         }
00043         return;
00044 }

00058 WireAbstraction::WirePort& WireAbstraction::WirePort::operator=( const WirePort& other ) {
00059         if (this != &other) {
00060                 presence_ = other.presence_;
00061                 width_ = other.width_;
00062                 direction_ = other.direction_;
00063         }
00064         return *this;

00066 
00067 WireAbstraction::WireAbstraction(QDomNode& wireNode): 
00068 qualifier_(),
00069 defaultValue_(-1),
00070 requiresDriver_(false),
00071 driverType_(General::ANY),
00072 onMaster_(), 
00073 onSlave_(),
00074 onSystem_() {
00075 
00076         for (int i = 0; i < wireNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00077                 QDomNode tempNode = wireNode.childNodes().at(i);
00078 
00079                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:qualifier")) {
00080                         qualifier_ = QSharedPointer<General::Qualifier>(new General::Qualifier(tempNode));
00081                 }
00082 
00083                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:onMaster")) {
00084                         onMaster_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>(new WirePort(tempNode));
00085                 }
00086 
00087                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:onSlave")) {
00088                         onSlave_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>(new WirePort(tempNode));
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:onSystem")) {
00092                         onSystem_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>(new WirePort(tempNode));
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:defaultValue")) {
00096                         bool ok = false;
00097                         defaultValue_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt(&ok);
00098 
00099                         // if the conversion was unsuccessful the default value is assigned
00100                         if (!ok) {
00101                                 defaultValue_ = -1;
00102                         }
00103                 }
00104 
00105                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:requiresDriver")) {
00106                         QString requiresDriver = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00107                         requiresDriver_ = General::str2Bool(requiresDriver, false);
00108 
00109                         QDomNamedNodeMap AttributeMap = tempNode.attributes();
00110                         driverType_ = General::str2DriverType(AttributeMap.namedItem(
00111                                         QString("spirit:driverType")).nodeValue(), General::ANY);
00112                 }
00113         }
00114         return;
00115 }

00117 WireAbstraction::WireAbstraction( const WireAbstraction& other ):
00118 qualifier_(),
00119 defaultValue_(other.defaultValue_),
00120 requiresDriver_(other.requiresDriver_),
00121 driverType_(other.driverType_),
00122 onMaster_(),
00123 onSlave_(), 
00124 onSystem_() {
00125 
00126         if (other.qualifier_) {
00127                 qualifier_ = QSharedPointer<General::Qualifier>(
00128                         new General::Qualifier(*other.qualifier_.data()));
00129         }
00130 
00131         if (other.onMaster_) {
00132                 onMaster_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>(
00133                         new WirePort(*other.onMaster_.data()));
00134         }
00135 
00136         if (other.onSlave_) {
00137                 onSlave_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>(
00138                         new WirePort(*other.onSlave_.data()));
00139         }
00140 
00141         if (other.onSystem_) {
00142                 onSystem_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>(
00143                         new WirePort(*other.onSystem_.data()));
00144         }
00145 }

00157 WireAbstraction& WireAbstraction::operator=( const WireAbstraction& other ) {
00158         if (this != &other) {
00159                 defaultValue_ = other.defaultValue_;
00160                 requiresDriver_ = other.requiresDriver_;
00161                 driverType_ = other.driverType_;
00162 
00163                 if (other.qualifier_) {
00164                         qualifier_ = QSharedPointer<General::Qualifier>(
00165                                 new General::Qualifier(*other.qualifier_.data()));
00166                 }
00167                 else
00168                         qualifier_ = QSharedPointer<General::Qualifier>();
00169 
00170                 if (other.onMaster_) {
00171                         onMaster_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>(
00172                                 new WirePort(*other.onMaster_.data()));
00173                 }
00174                 else
00175                         onMaster_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>();
00176 
00177                 if (other.onSlave_) {
00178                         onSlave_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>(
00179                                 new WirePort(*other.onSlave_.data()));
00180                 }
00181                 else
00182                         onSlave_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>();
00183 
00184                 if (other.onSystem_) {
00185                         onSystem_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>(
00186                                 new WirePort(*other.onSystem_.data()));
00187                 }
00188                 else
00189                         onSystem_ = QSharedPointer<WirePort>();
00190         }
00191         return *this;
00192 }

00197 void WireAbstraction::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00198         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:wire");
00199 
00200         if (qualifier_) {
00201                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:qualifier");
00202 
00203                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:isAddress",
00204                                 General::bool2Str(qualifier_->isAddress_));
00205                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:isData",
00206                                 General::bool2Str(qualifier_->isData_));
00207                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:isClock",
00208                                 General::bool2Str(qualifier_->isClock_));
00209                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:isReset",
00210                                 General::bool2Str(qualifier_->isReset_));
00211 
00212                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:qualifier
00213         }
00214 
00215         if (onMaster_) {
00216                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:onMaster");
00217                 writeWirePort(writer, onMaster_.data());
00218                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:onMaster
00219         }
00220 
00221         if (onSlave_) {
00222                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:onSlave");
00223                 writeWirePort(writer, onSlave_.data());
00224                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:onSlave
00225         }
00226 
00227         if (onSystem_) {
00228                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:onSystem");
00229                 writeWirePort(writer, onSystem_.data());
00230                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit::onSystem
00231         }
00232 
00233         // if default value is defined then use it
00234         if (defaultValue_ >= 0) {
00235                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:defaultValue",
00236                                 QString::number(defaultValue_));
00237         }
00238         // if default value was not defined then use requiresDriver
00239         else {
00240                 writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:requiresDriver");
00241                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:driverType",
00242                                 General::driverType2Str(driverType_));
00243                 writer.writeCharacters(General::bool2Str(requiresDriver_));
00244         }
00245 
00246         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:wire
00247 }
00248 
00249 void WireAbstraction::writeWirePort(QXmlStreamWriter& writer,
00250                 WirePort* port) {
00251         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:presence",
00252                         General::presence2Str(port->presence_));
00253 
00254         if (port->width_ > 0) {
00255                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:width",
00256                                 QString::number(port->width_));
00257         }
00258 
00259         if (port->direction_ != General::DIRECTION_INVALID) {
00260                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:direction",
00261                                 General::direction2Str(port->direction_));
00262         }
00263 
00264 
00265         // TODO add writing of spirit:modeConstraints
00266 }

00279 void WireAbstraction::setDefaultValue(int defaultValue) {

00309 void WireAbstraction::setDriverType(General::DriverType driverType) {

00519 General::Direction WireAbstraction::getDirection( General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00520         switch (mode) {
00521                         case General::MASTER: {
00522                                 if (onMaster_)
00523                                         return onMaster_->direction_;
00524                                 else 
00525                                         return General::DIRECTION_INVALID;
00526                                                                   }
00527                         case General::MIRROREDMASTER: {
00528                                 if (onMaster_)
00529                                         return General::convert2Mirrored(onMaster_->direction_);
00530                                 else
00531                                         return General::DIRECTION_INVALID;
00532                                                                                   }
00533                         case General::SLAVE: {
00534                                 if (onSlave_)
00535                                         return onSlave_->direction_;
00536                                 else
00537                                         return General::DIRECTION_INVALID;
00538                                                                  }
00539                         case General::MIRROREDSLAVE: {
00540                                 if (onSlave_)
00541                                         return General::convert2Mirrored(onSlave_->direction_);
00542                                 else
00543                                         return General::DIRECTION_INVALID;
00544                                                                                  }
00545                         case General::SYSTEM: {
00546                                 if (onSystem_)
00547                                         return onSystem_->direction_;
00548                                 else
00549                                         return General::DIRECTION_INVALID;
00550                                                                   }
00551                         case General::MIRROREDSYSTEM: {
00552                                 if (onSystem_)
00553                                         return General::convert2Mirrored(onSystem_->direction_);
00554                                 else
00555                                         return General::DIRECTION_INVALID;
00556                                                                                   }
00557                         default:
00558                                 return General::DIRECTION_INVALID;
00559 
00560         }
00561 }
00562 
00563 bool WireAbstraction::isRequired( General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00564         switch (mode) {
00565                 case General::MASTER:
00566                 case General::MIRROREDMASTER: {
00567                         if (onMaster_ && onMaster_->presence_ == General::REQUIRED)
00568                                 return true;
00569                         return false;
00570                                                                           }
00571                 case General::SLAVE:
00572                 case General::MIRROREDSLAVE: {
00573                         if (onSlave_ && onSlave_->presence_ == General::REQUIRED)
00574                                 return true;
00575                         return false;
00576                                                                          }
00577                 case General::SYSTEM: 
00578                 case General::MIRROREDSYSTEM: {
00579                         if (onSystem_ && onSystem_->presence_ == General::REQUIRED)
00580                                 return true;
00581                         return false;
00582                                                                           }
00583                                                                           // mode == monitor
00584                 default:
00585                         return false;
00586         }
00587 }
00588 
00589 bool WireAbstraction::isOptional( General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00590         switch (mode) {
00591                 case General::MASTER:
00592                 case General::MIRROREDMASTER: {
00593                         if (onMaster_ && onMaster_->presence_ == General::OPTIONAL)
00594                                 return true;
00595                         return false;
00596                                                                           }
00597                 case General::SLAVE:
00598                 case General::MIRROREDSLAVE: {
00599                         if (onSlave_ && onSlave_->presence_ == General::OPTIONAL)
00600                                 return true;
00601                         return false;
00602                                                                          }
00603                 case General::SYSTEM: 
00604                 case General::MIRROREDSYSTEM: {
00605                         if (onSystem_ && onSystem_->presence_ == General::OPTIONAL)
00606                                 return true;
00607                         return false;
00608                                                                           }
00609                                                                           // mode == monitor
00610                 default:
00611                         return false;
00612         }
00613 }

00615 bool WireAbstraction::isIllegal( General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00616         switch (mode) {
00617                 case General::MASTER:
00618                 case General::MIRROREDMASTER: {
00619                         if (onMaster_ && onMaster_->presence_ == General::ILLEGAL)
00620                                 return true;
00621                         return false;
00622                                                                           }
00623                 case General::SLAVE:
00624                 case General::MIRROREDSLAVE: {
00625                         if (onSlave_ && onSlave_->presence_ == General::ILLEGAL)
00626                                 return true;
00627                         return false;
00628                                                                          }
00629                 case General::SYSTEM: 
00630                 case General::MIRROREDSYSTEM: {
00631                         if (onSystem_ && onSystem_->presence_ == General::ILLEGAL)
00632                                 return true;
00633                         return false;
00634                                                                           }
00635                                                                           // mode == monitor
00636                 default:

00641 int WireAbstraction::getWidth( General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00642         switch (mode) {
00643                 case General::MASTER:
00644                 case General::MIRROREDMASTER: {
00645                         if (onMaster_)
00646                                 return onMaster_->width_;
00647                         return -1;
00648                                                                           }
00649                 case General::SLAVE:
00650                 case General::MIRROREDSLAVE: {
00651                         if (onSlave_)
00652                                 return onSlave_->width_;
00653                         return -1;
00654                                                                          }
00655                 case General::SYSTEM: 
00656                 case General::MIRROREDSYSTEM: {
00657                         if (onSystem_)
00658                                 return onSystem_->width_;
00659                         return -1;
00660                                                                           }
00661                                                                           // mode == monitor
00662                 default:
00663                         return -1;
00664         }
